title: Amazing, Wonderful, Legal
author: Jeff
citation: Jeff. "Amazing, Wonderful, Legal: experience with Phenibut (ID 66022)". Erowid.org. Mar 6, 2012. erowid.org/exp/66022

report: At approx.11:30a.m. I ingested 2,000 mg of phenibut xt bought from [website]. About 2 hours later I noticed myself feeling sedated and euphoric. I ingested another 2,000mg and went to work. At work my balance was obviously off, I felt completely messed up and goofy, singing and acting a fool. This stuff is great. It is pretty cheap, and it works wonders for social anxiety and insomnia.
